about_the_game:
Ready for tricky obstacles in different worlds? Do you love challenges and monsters? Are you a jump and run pro?

In "The Land of Magic" you can explore several worlds with always different obstacles. Jump and run to get to the finish and activate your boost to get over difficult obstacles faster and easier. Play a total of three different game modes with different tasks and challenges and register for external events. Earn rewards and achieve new high scores. Play the current season and earn great new looks such as colors, hats or clothes for your ghost for free.


World mode:
The world mode offers several worlds to explore and discover. Overcome obstacles and monsters to reach the end. Experience different cultures and prove your timing and skill in overcoming various tasks. With practice, you can choose to increase the difficulty level to hardcore, where there are no checkpoints and faster, more difficult obstacles - which are only for challengers.


High out:
Jump from platform to platform before they break to avoid falling off. Get as high as you can and overcome moving platforms and spikes. Achieve new high scores, outdo other players and take part in the high out league.


Daily challenges:
Play new challenges every day to earn rewards. Race against the clock, collect stars and overcome mysterious obstacles. All three daily challenges come on certain days of the week. Master their tasks to earn great rewards. Set new high scores and become one of the best in the world.


Play the current season:
Play the current season to earn exclusive rewards. New seasons are released every few months with cool new content. Complete tasks and sign up for the season hunt mode. Dodge obstacles to reach new high scores. What's special is that your speed is out of control! The ghost gets faster and faster and has to overcome red platforms, spikes and other obstacles quickly and at the right time.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are an estimation and might change.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are an estimation and might change.
